mapper.select: SELECT c.comments_id, c.comments_contents, c.comments_date, c.post_id, m.member_id, m.nickname AS c_nickname FROM Comments c Join Member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.post_id = #{post_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Comments WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND comments_id = #{comments_id}
